body.name: LIGE Military Smart Watch for Men,1.95" AMOLED Screen Always on Smart Watches with 100+ Sport Modes,Heart Rate Tracker, AI Voice/400mAh, Smartwatch for Android iOS Space Gray
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 32 mins
features: 【2024-NEWEST COLOR】Bidding farewell to the mundane black of the past and introducing unique space gray.It possesses the profound mystery of black while infusing the modern technological ambiance of gray. This is an elevation of color, a fashion revolution, adding a touch of unique futurism to your wrist.Crafted with a TC4 titanium alloy monocoque dual-metal case, this smartwatch is not only lightweight and comfortable but also boasts exceptional shock resistance.

【Newly Upgraded AMOLED Screen】LIGE Smart watch with AMOLED displays offer numerous advantages. They are easy to read even in direct sunlight and offer an impressive resolution of 410 x 502, twice as high as conventional watches. The always-on display enables the continuous display of information such as step,time,battery level，calories. AMOLED displays are also more energy efficient and save up to 40% power compared to LCD screens.

【Bluetooth Calling & Smart Notifications】Free up your hands with the smart watch and make calls from your own wrist. With a built-in speaker and microphone, calls become easy to make, whether you're exercising outdoors or tidying up at home. Once connected to your phone, you can make, receive and reject calls and view call logs directly on the mens smart watch. Stay connected to SMS and APP messages(Text, Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter, etc.), never miss any important information.

【110+Sport Modes】This for men has many features you need, providing a better experience with a new way to train and advanced capabilities. It supports 110 sport modes, including walking, running, biking,rock climbing, hiking etc.The smart watch will record your heart rate, pace, running distance, exercise time, calories at any time so that you can better understand your exercise status.

【Heart Health & Sleep tracker】Our smart watches can track your heart rate, blood oxygen, and blood pressure, presenting detailed reports on the "Fitcloudpro" app. Additionally, this bluetooth smart watch is equipped to track your sleep patterns, providing comprehensive analysis through the app. You can get weekly reports on the app.By accessing these insights, you gain a better understanding of your health status.NOTE:The data is for reference only and cannot be used for medical purposes.

【Experience Convenience on Your Wrist】The smart watch offers a wide range of useful features, including Always-on Display(on and off), sedentary reminder,alarm clocks reminder, camera controller,stopwatch,AI Voice,weather display,compass,multi-language support,ect.Experience convenience and efficiency all on your wrist.With wide compatibility, this smartwatch pairs seamlessly with most iOS 8.0 and Android 4.4 or above smartphones.

【After-Sales Service&Compatible】We offer 2-year worry-free product warranty (Rep1acement, Return or Accessories Replacement Service). Buy without risk! If you have any questions about your smartwatch, please contact us. 7*24 hours quick reply, and solve all the problems for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smartwatch Details: Amoled Display Vibrant and brilliant display, delivering full and vivid colors, provides the user with an impressive visual experience. Outstanding contrast and black representation, with each pixel capable of independent illumination to achieve absolute black, enabling clear images and revealing fine details. Impressive energy-saving features compared to conventional LCD screens, as power is only consumed when displaying bright colors, resulting in significant energy conservation and effectively extending battery life. Fast response time, with extremely quick pixel switching speed to ensure smooth display of dynamic content. Menu scrolling and video playback are seamless, akin to silk. Long Battery Time:400mAH.One charge can last 3-5 days, bringing you an efficient and convenient smart lifestyleShock-resistant Construction: Military smart watches typically employ internal shock-resistant technology to effectively minimize the impact of external vibrations on the internal components of the watch, preventing any dislodgement or damage to the parts.

Bluetooth Call The smart watch for men comes with built-in calling functionality, eliminating the need to frequently retrieve your phone from your pocket or bag to answer calls. Whether you're exercising, driving, working, or in other scenarios, a simple tap on the smartwatch screen or button allows you to answer important calls and maintain conversations. Additionally, the smartwatch offers you the option to reject incoming calls, enabling you to easily block disturbances during times when concentration and tranquility are needed, enhancing convenience and comfort in your daily life. Smart Notification The smartwatch will vibrate to remind you when your phone receives the messages or App notifications (Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, Instagram, etc) you won't miss any important information

100+ Sport Modes:The mens smart watch includes 100+ exercise modes including running, cycling, basketball, skating, baseball, yoga, tennis, and more....Daily Exercise Data Monitor:This fitness tracker watch automatically track count your full-day steps, calories burned, distances, miles walked and duration to get a clear situation of your daily exercise. You can check the data on the smart watch or "FitclouldPro" app, which can help you track and optimize training effects and arrange fitness plans.

Heart Rate Monitor:Monitors heart rate 24/7, you can get heart rate intervals on the watch when it syncs with the watch and shows you all the details with charts so you know your physical condition at any time of the day, providing more in-depth insights into your health status.Blood Oxygen Monitoring:The blood oxygen function is also measured by the back sensor, which requires you to wear it correctly every time you take a measurement. The more measurements you take, the more accurate the data will be when wearing the smart watch and your skin perfectSleep Tracker:Automatically monitors and analyze sleep quality (21:00-9:00). This smart watches automatically monitors and analyzes your sleep quality, sleep time, and sleep stage (deep sleep, light sleep and wake up). The data will be recorded on the APP, and you can understand your sleep quality through the data and adjust your daily routine.Blood Pressure:Empower yourself with our smart watch for men featuring a built-in blood pressure monitoring function. Your blood pressure data is seamlessly recorded and stored in the app, allowing you to effortlessly track your health trends over time.

Music Control The smartwatch can control the music playback on your smartphone, allowing you to conveniently adjust the music during workouts or in daily life. Weather Forecast The military smart watch for men can provide real-time weather information to help you stay informed about the local weather conditions at all times. Alarms and Reminders The smart watch can be set with alarms and reminders to assist you in organizing your schedule and reminding you of important matters. Stay Active and Hydrated Utilize the "Drink Reminder" and "Sedentary reminder" features to combat a sedentary lifestyle. The smartwatch gently reminds you to take breaks and stay hydrated, promoting a healthier lifestyle. Find Phone: When you forget where your phone is, click the "Find Phone" function on your smart watch, your phone will ring and vibrate. Alarm Clock Set up to 5 alarms on your smartwatch, each at a different time. Wake up with confidence and receive timely reminders throughout the day, ensuring you stay on track. ...

2 Smartwatch Bands: The watch comes with 2 bands(Stainless steel strap + silicone strap) - you can be easily interchanged to match various outfits.Free Watch Faces:With over 200 free watch faces available in the app, you can change UI on the app.DIY Yourself:Our smart watch also supports custom watch faces, enabling you to upload your favorite pictures, such as pictures of your family, pets, idols, etc., and use them as personalized watch faces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best model is up to $100
reviews.reviewText: I got this watch after careful selection because my requirements were very high. I had to return a few failed models, but I found what I wanted. The watch is perfectly accurate in all measurements, very comfortable on the hand. All messages are perfectly readable due to the large Amoled screen. New options such as answering calls and dialing numbers. and I really like the rare non-switchable screen option. That is, if I turn on this option, then a simplified economical version of the time readings always lights up on the screen. There is a choice of digital, analog or disable option. It is clear that the energy consumption is somewhat higher, but it is worth it. A very successful and well-made model. The highest score.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Rugged, functional and handsome men’s smartwatch the has a multitude of useful measurements and functions.Multiple watch faces available on app which supports watches functionality.After setup and getting used to I find this watch meets the needs I have, and believe me I have researched a number of before purchasing this one. VERY SATISFIED.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love everything about it.
reviews.reviewText: It first is little hard to use it but once you get the hang of it is a great smart watch. I haven't had any issues and battery lasses a good 4-5 days before recharge it. I don't know what's the range of the Bluetooth feature but I left my phone charging in my office two floors away and I was able to receive a call on the watch. If you love listening to music while working you can keep your phone on the charger and listen to music through the watch by using the media audio feature on the watch you can also play and pause the music through the watch. Any guy would love this watch for he's birthday, Father's day and Christmas. Ladies there's also a women's feature that keeps track of your pregnancy and health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Watch loses time after 1 1/2 months.
reviews.reviewText: After 1 1/2 months my watch is losing time. My rating would have been 5 other than the losing time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great with color-rich screen
reviews.reviewText: LIGE’S “Military Smart Watch for Men with Bluetooth Calls,1.95" AMOLED Screen Always on Display Smart Watches with 100+ Sport Modes,Heart Rate Tracker,400mAh,Smartwatch for Android iOS Space Gray,” is one of the better quality smartwatches out there, featuring a large screen with AMOLED display, which offers sharper and color-rich display compared to LCD and OLED screens smartwatches. This smartwatch can pretty much do anything that other smartwatches can do, apart from texting as this watch can only read incoming texts but it cannot send outgoing texts, which is important to me. Other than that, this is a heavy duty, solid, and easy to read and operate smartwatch.I highly recommend this to others.

reviews.reviewText: Very pretty watch...the screen is vibrant and the watch has lots of features!
